name: Additive sedation
actions: Avoid unnecessary combinations of sedating agents.
Use the lowest effective doses and monitor for impairment, falls risk, and oversedation (educational).

rationale: Both drugs are associated with sedation.
Combined sedating effects can be additive and increase impairment risk.

explanation_template: {A_name} and {B_name} both have sedating effects. Combined use may increase sedation, impairment, and falls risk (educational).
